data.title: NOMURA
data.text:
Q1. When was the company incorporated?

The Nomura Securities Co., Ltd. was established as a spin-off from the Securities Department of Osaka Nomura Bank Co., Ltd. on December 25, 1925. On October 1, 2001 Nomura adopt a holding company structure and Nomura Holdings, Inc. was established.

Q3. On which stock exchange is Nomura Holdings, Inc. traded?

In October 1961, Nomura Securities listed on the Tokyo and Nagoya stock exchanges (Company code: 8604). Nomura Holdings, Inc. was listed on the New York Stock exchange (NYSE ticker symbol: NMR) on December 17, 2001. The company is also listed on Singapore stock exchange.

Q5. Where can I find the Management Structure and the Board of Directors?

Please visit the pages below for the outlines of Nomura Holdings and Nomura Securities.

Nomura Holdings, Inc.

Nomura Securities Co., Ltd.

Q7. Where can I find about your Group Companies?

You can find the outline of the Nomura Group companies at "Group Companies".

Group Companies

Q8. Do you have any information about the Groups' social contribution?

Yes. Please visit our "Sustainability" page.

Sustainability

Q9. Where can I find the financial results?

You will find our Quarterly Earnings and presentation material at "Quarterly Earnings".

Quarterly Earnings
